commit.message:
regex.h (regex_traits<>::transform_primary): Avoid past-the-end dereferences.

2013-08-16  Tim Shen  <timshen91@gmail.com>

	* include/bits/regex.h (regex_traits<>::transform_primary):
	Avoid past-the-end dereferences.

From-SVN: r201783

+	Avoid past-the-end dereferences.
